line-height: 18px;"><br><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #839496;">&nbsp; &nbsp;英文谓语动词有三态之分：</span></div><br><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #859900;">&nbsp; &nbsp;* &nbsp;</span><span style="color: #839496;">时态（tense）时间上包括现在时、过去时、将来时，动作效果上有一般式、完成式、进行式，完成进行式。</span></div><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #859900;">&nbsp; &nbsp;* &nbsp;</span><span style="color: #839496;">语态（voice）又分主动和被动，Active vs. passive voice。</span></div><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #859900;">&nbsp; &nbsp;* &nbsp;</span><span style="color: #839496;">情态（mood）表示说话者的情绪态度。</span></div><br><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #839496;">&nbsp; &nbsp;通过不同动词（助动词、实义动词、系动词）的不同形式组合起来将这三种形态表达不同意思：</span></div><br><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #859900;">&nbsp; &nbsp;* &nbsp;</span><span style="color: #839496;">I have eaten sushi many times before. (tense)</span></div><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #859900;">&nbsp; &nbsp;* &nbsp;</span><span style="color: #839496;">That piece of sushi was eaten by me. (voice)</span></div><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #859900;">&nbsp; &nbsp;* &nbsp;</span><span style="color: #839496;">Did you eat my sushi? (mood)</span></div><br><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #839496;">&nbsp; &nbsp;时态作为英文中的一个重要概念，及时时间和动作效果两个维度，时间上有“过去时”、“现在时”、“将来时”</span></div><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #839496;">&nbsp; &nbsp;三个基本形式，另外还有一种“过去将来”时，代入过去设想将要发生的事：</span></div><br><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #859900;">&nbsp; &nbsp;- &nbsp;</span><span style="color: #839496;">[1] = Simple 一般式</span></div><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #859900;">&nbsp; &nbsp;- &nbsp;</span><span style="color: #839496;">[2] = Progressve/continuous 进行式</span></div><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #859900;">&nbsp; &nbsp;- &nbsp;</span><span style="color: #839496;">[3] = Perfect 完成式</span></div><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #859900;">&nbsp; &nbsp;- &nbsp;</span><span style="color: #839496;">[4] = Perfect progressive 完成进行式</span></div><br><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #839496;">&nbsp; &nbsp;“时式”两个维度的信息通过时间线（Time line）与动作线（Action line）组合在一起得到以下示意图，</span></div><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #839496;">&nbsp; &nbsp;暂且称之为“英文时态组合图”（Timeline graph for English）。横向为时间线，纵向为行为线。那么，</span></div><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #839496;">&nbsp; &nbsp;英语时态就可以很好地用“◯时刻”、“◕跨时刻”、“◉●某时刻之前”等词或者符号去界定行为、事件的发生状态。</span></div><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #839496;">&nbsp; &nbsp;图中使用四个 Unicode 符号来表达时态中与谓语动作相关的的四种底层含义：</span></div><br><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #859900;">&nbsp; &nbsp;* &nbsp;</span><span style="color: #839496;">◯ 行为时刻 (Moment in time)，一般时（Simple）行为在时刻分界线表示在某一时刻发生。</span></div><br><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #859900;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; - &nbsp;</span><span style="color: #839496;">action that takes place once, never or several times</span></div><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #859900;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; - &nbsp;</span><span style="color: #839496;">actions that happen one after another</span></div><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #859900;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; - &nbsp;</span><span style="color: #839496;">actions that suddenly take place</span></div><br><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #859900;">&nbsp; &nbsp;* &nbsp;</span><span style="color: #839496;">◕ 周期行为 (Period of time)，进行式（Progressive）为跨线的行为表示。</span></div><br><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #859900;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; - &nbsp;</span><span style="color: #839496;">action that started before a certain moment and lasts beyond that moment</span></div><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #859900;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; - &nbsp;</span><span style="color: #839496;">actions taking place at the same time</span></div><br><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #859900;">&nbsp; &nbsp;* &nbsp;</span><span style="color: #839496;">◉ 行为效果 (Result)，完成式为时刻线之前发生的行为、事件。</span></div><br><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #859900;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; - &nbsp;</span><span style="color: #839496;">action taking place before a certain moment in time</span></div><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #859900;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; - &nbsp;</span><span style="color: #839496;">puts emphasis on the result</span></div><br><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #859900;">&nbsp; &nbsp;* &nbsp;</span><span style="color: #839496;">● 持续行为 (Course / Duration)，完成进行式为时刻线之前发生的行为、事件。</span></div><br><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #859900;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; - &nbsp;</span><span style="color: #839496;">action taking place before a certain moment in time</span></div><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #859900;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; - &nbsp;</span><span style="color: #839496;">puts emphasis on the course or duration of the action</span></div><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre; background-color: rgb(0, 43, 54); line-height: 18px;"><br></div><font face="Fira Code, Consolas, Courier New, monospace" color="#839496"><span style="font-size: 13px; white-space: pre;"> 比如“我会吉他但是现在没有玩吉他”对应“一般现在”和“一般进行”表示，I play guitar, but I am not playing now.</span></font></div><div style="background-color: rgb(0, 43, 54); line-height: 18px;"><font face="Fira Code, Consolas, Courier New, monospace" color="#839496"><span style="font-size: 13px; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;│ &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; │ &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; │ &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; │</span></div><br><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #859900;">&nbsp; &nbsp;=== ====================================== ====================================== =========================================</span></div><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #839496;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Past &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Present &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;Future</span></div><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #859900;">&nbsp; &nbsp;=== ====================================== ====================================== =========================================</span></div><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #839496;">&nbsp; &nbsp;[1] I </span><span style="color: #268bd2;">`looked`</span><span style="color: #839496;"> at the painting. &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;I </span><span style="color: #268bd2;">`look`</span><span style="color: #839496;"> at the painting. &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;I </span><span style="color: #268bd2;">`will look`</span><span style="color: #839496;"> at the painting.</span></div><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #839496;">&nbsp; &nbsp;[2] I </span><span style="color: #268bd2;">`was looking`</span><span style="color: #839496;"> at the painting. &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; I </span><span style="color: #268bd2;">`am looking`</span><span style="color: #839496;"> at the painting. &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;I </span><span style="color: #268bd2;">`will be looking`</span><span style="color: #839496;"> at the painting.</span></div><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #839496;">&nbsp; &nbsp;[3] I </span><span style="color: #268bd2;">`had looked`</span><span style="color: #839496;"> at the painting. &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;I </span><span style="color: #268bd2;">`have looked`</span><span style="color: #839496;"> at the painting. &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; I </span><span style="color: #268bd2;">`will have looked`</span><span style="color: #839496;"> at the painting.</span></div><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #839496;">&nbsp; &nbsp;[4] I </span><span style="color: #268bd2;">`had been looking`</span><span style="color: #839496;"> at the painting. &nbsp;I </span><span style="color: #268bd2;">`have been looking`</span><span style="color: #839496;"> at the painting. I </span><span style="color: #268bd2;">`will have been looking`</span><span style="color: #839496;"> at the painting.</span></div><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #859900;">&nbsp; &nbsp;=== ====================================== ====================================== =========================================</span></div><br><div style="font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150);"><span style="color: #839496;">&nbsp; &nbsp;</span>时态的基本结构：时间状态通过 `</span><font color="#268bd2">助动词</font><font color="#839496">` 体现，行为状态通过 `</font><font color="#268bd2">谓语动词</font><font color="#839496">` 体现。现在时就是 do 或 does </font></div><div style=""><font face="Fira Code, Consolas, Courier New, monospace"><span style="font-size: 13px; white-space: pre;"><font color="#839496"> 形式，将来时就变成 will 动词，过去时就变成 did 或 had。过去将来时就变成 could/would。行为状态上，<br> 一般行为谓语就使用 do 或者 is 这样的 `</font><font color="#268bd2">原型</font><font color="#839496">`，完成行为变成 have/has/had done `</font><font color="#268bd2">过去分词</font><font color="#839496">`，<br> 进行中行为就变成 ~ing 形式的 `</font><font color="#268bd2">现在分词</font><font color="#839496">`，完成进行也是进行态（完成+进行），have/has/had been。</font></span></font></div><br><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #839496;">&nbsp; &nbsp;过去时体现在实义动词的过去分词（一般是动词加 ed 后缀），或者助动词的过去分词上体现（had）。进行</span></div><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #839496;">&nbsp; &nbsp;式结构中，因为需要使用实义动词的现在分词（ing 后缀）形式来表达“进行中”，所以过去时这一语法特征</span></div><div style=""><span style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;">&nbsp; &nbsp;只能通过引入辅助动词的过去式来体现。</span></div><div style=""><font face="Fira Code, Consolas, Courier New, monospace" color="#839496"><span style="font-size: 13px; white-space: pre;"><br></span></font></div><div style=""><font face="Fira Code, Consolas, Courier New, monospace"><span style="font-size: 13px; white-space: pre;"><font color="#839496"> </font><font color="#268bd2">=========================== =================================</font><font color="#839496"><br> Simple Past ：我吃过饭了（腊肉炒芥菜的味道真好）。<br> Simple Present ：我吃米饭（陈述事实，但是我现在没吃）。<br> Simple Future ：我要吃饭啦（又到干饭时间）。<br> Past Progressive ：我刚才吃饭了（所以没听到你的电话）。<br> Present Progressive ：我在吃饭呢（别打扰我干饭）。<br> Future Progressive ：下午 1 点时我会吃着饭（这是计划）。<br> Past Perfect ：我刚才吃过饭的（肚子应该饿了）。<br> Present Perfect ：我刚吃过饭（你不会又想约我吃饭吧）。<br> Future Perfect ：我将要在 1 点吃饭（你不要等我了）。<br> Past Perfect Progressive ：我刚才在吃饭了（一直吃着没饱）。<br> Present Perfect Progressive ：我在吃饭（并且还没吃饱）。<br> Future Perfect Progressive ：下午 1 点我肯定吃着饭呢（没时间干别的）。<br> </font><font color="#268bd2">=========================== =================================</font></span></font></div><br><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #839496;">&nbsp; &nbsp;过去将来时（The Past Future Tense）使用上相对较少，并且概念上很古怪，更像是英语使用者总结出来的。</span></div><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #839496;">&nbsp; &nbsp;Past Future 时态表示从过去时间看将来可能会发生的动作或者状态。主要在于“可能”，好比我上周说周末会</span></div><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #839496;">&nbsp; &nbsp;去打球，对于上周这个时间来说，周末打球是将来发生的事情，但是对于现在来说是已经过去的时间。为了区别这</span></div><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #839496;">&nbsp; &nbsp;种“过去将来”的过去时间与 Past 时态所指的过去，引入了过去将来时态，使用 would、should、could </span></div><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #839496;">&nbsp; &nbsp;助动词与时态中的 be、have 动词结构组合。</span></div><br><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #859900;">&nbsp; &nbsp;=================================== =========================================</span></div><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #839496;">&nbsp; &nbsp;Simple Past Future &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;I </span><span style="color: #268bd2;">`would look`</span><span style="color: #839496;"> at the painting.</span></div><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #839496;">&nbsp; &nbsp;Past Future Progressive/continuous &nbsp;I </span><span style="color: #268bd2;">`would be looking`</span><span style="color: #839496;"> at the painting.</span></div><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #839496;">&nbsp; &nbsp;Past Future Perfect &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; I </span><span style="color: #268bd2;">`would have looked`</span><span style="color: #839496;"> at the painting.</span></div><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #839496;">&nbsp; &nbsp;Past Future Perfect progressive &nbsp; &nbsp; I </span><span style="color: #268bd2;">`would have been looking`</span><span style="color: #839496;"> at the painting.</span></div><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #859900;">&nbsp; &nbsp;=================================== =========================================</span></div><br><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #859900;">&nbsp; &nbsp;1. </span><span style="color: #268bd2;">`would | should | could`</span><span style="color: #839496;"> + 动词原形，“过去时”由前面的助动词体现，“一般式”由动词原型体现；</span></div><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #859900;">&nbsp; &nbsp;2. </span><span style="color: #268bd2;">`was | were`</span><span style="color: #839496;"> + going to + 动词原形；</span></div><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #859900;">&nbsp; &nbsp;3. </span><span style="color: #268bd2;">`come | go | leave | arrive | start`</span><span style="color: #839496;"> 等瞬间动词的过去进行时来表示过去将来时；</span></div><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #859900;">&nbsp; &nbsp;4. </span><span style="color: #268bd2;">`was | were`</span><span style="color: #839496;"> + </span><span style="color: #268bd2;">`due | about`</span><span style="color: #839496;"> to do 用于表示根据计划，安排定于某事做某事；</span></div><br><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #839496;">&nbsp; &nbsp;算上过去将来时，时态组合共有 16 种，但是最常用的是 Simple Present 和 Present Perfect Progressive，</span></div><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #839496;">&nbsp; &nbsp;它们分别用于表示当前的阶段的状态、习惯、客观，后者表示从过去到现在持续的动作、所起的作用效果或者</span></div><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #839496;">&nbsp; &nbsp;最近发生的事件。此外，还有几种较常用的时态：</span></div><br><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #859900;">&nbsp; &nbsp;==================== ========================================================</span></div><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #839496;">&nbsp; &nbsp;Simple Past &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;表示过去发生的事，或者过去经常或反复发生的动作。</span></div><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #839496;">&nbsp; &nbsp;Simple Future &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;表示将来要发生的动作、或存在的状态，将来经常或反复发生的动作。</span></div><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #839496;">&nbsp; &nbsp;Present Progressive &nbsp;表示说话时正在发生的动作，因为使用动词现在分词，常被称为 ing 式。</span></div><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #839496;">&nbsp; &nbsp;Present Perfect &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;表示过去发生或已经完成的动作对现在造成的影响或结果。</span></div><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #839496;">&nbsp; &nbsp;Past Progressive &nbsp; &nbsp; 表示过去进行中的动作，这个时间由上下文给出或者使用时间状语。</span></div><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #839496;">&nbsp; &nbsp;Past Perfect &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 表示过去的时间之前发生或完成了的动作，动作发生的时间是“过去的过去”。</span></div><div style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><span style="color: #859900;">&nbsp; &nbsp;==================== ========================================================</span></div><br></div>" id="fSPwx9LIQS16wjAs6Zgw-5"> <mxCell style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontFamily=Architects Daughter;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DArchitects%2BDaughter;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry width="1030" height="2503" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </UserObject> <object label="<div style="line-height: 140%;"><font color="#1a1a1a" face="Fira Code, Consolas, Courier New, monospace" style="" size="1"><span style="white-space: pre;"><b style="font-size: 25px;">英语时态时间线图解</b></span></font></div><span style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; white-space: pre;">for </span><span style="color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; white-space: pre;">Tensees of English</span></font></div>" link="https://vscode.dev/github/Jeangowhy/opendocs/blob/maind/opendocs/English_Grammar.rst" id="fSPwx9LIQS16wjAs6Zgw-3"> <mxCell style="shape=note;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;backgroundOutline=1;fontColor=#000000;darkOpacity=0.05;fillColor=#FFF9B2;strokeColor=none;fillStyle=solid;direction=west;gradientDirection=north;gradientColor=#FFF2A1;shadow=1;size=20;pointerEvents=1;fontFamily=Architects Daughter;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DArchitects%2BDaughter;fontSize=24;labelBackgroundColor=none;fontStyle=0;align=right;spacingLeft=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="695" y="25" width="319" height="108" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </object> <mxCell id="fSPwx9LIQS16wjAs6Zgw-8" value="<div style=""><b style="background-color: initial; color: rgb(26, 26, 26); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; white-space: pre; font-size: 25px;">英语时态时间线图解</b></div>" style="shape=note;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;backgroundOutline=1;fontColor=#000000;darkOpacity=0.05;fillColor=#FFF9B2;strokeColor=none;fillStyle=solid;direction=west;gradientDirection=north;gradientColor=#FFF2A1;shadow=1;size=0;pointerEvents=1;fontFamily=Architects Daughter;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DArchitects%2BDaughter;align=right;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="20" y="25" width="994" height="43" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <object label="" link="https://github.com/Jeangowhy/opendocs/blob/main/English_Grammar.rst" linkTarget="_blank" id="fSPwx9LIQS16wjAs6Zgw-6"> <mxCell style="shape=image;aspect=fixed;image=data:image/svg+xml,;fontColor=none;noLabel=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="28" y="30.5" width="32" height="32" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </object> <object label="" link="https://space.bilibili.com/202364884" linkTarget="_blank" id="fSPwx9LIQS16wjAs6Zgw-7"> <mxCell style="shape=image;aspect=fixed;image=data:image/svg+xml,;fontColor=none;labelBackgroundColor=none;noLabel=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="72.995" y="30.5" width="32" height="32" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </object> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
div.span: 英文谓语动词有三态之分：

div.style: color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
div.span: 时态（tense）时间上包括现在时、过去时、将来时，动作效果上有一般式、完成式、进行式，完成进行式。

div.style: color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
div.span: 语态（voice）又分主动和被动，Active vs. passive voice。

div.style: color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
div.span: 情态（mood）表示说话者的情绪态度。

div.style: color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
div.span: 通过不同动词（助动词、实义动词、系动词）的不同形式组合起来将这三种形态表达不同意思：

div.style: color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
div.span: I have eaten sushi many times before. (tense)

div.style: color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
div.span: That piece of sushi was eaten by me. (voice)

div.style: color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
div.span: 时态作为英文中的一个重要概念，及时时间和动作效果两个维度，时间上有“过去时”、“现在时”、“将来时”

div.style: color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
div.span: 三个基本形式，另外还有一种“过去将来”时，代入过去设想将要发生的事：

div.style: color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
div.span: “时式”两个维度的信息通过时间线（Time line）与动作线（Action line）组合在一起得到以下示意图，

div.style: color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
div.span: 暂且称之为“英文时态组合图”（Timeline graph for English）。横向为时间线，纵向为行为线。那么，

div.style: color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
div.span: 英语时态就可以很好地用“◯时刻”、“◕跨时刻”、“◉●某时刻之前”等词或者符号去界定行为、事件的发生状态。

div.style: color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
div.span: 图中使用四个 Unicode 符号来表达时态中与谓语动作相关的的四种底层含义：

div.style: color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
div.span: ◯ 行为时刻 (Moment in time)，一般时（Simple）行为在时刻分界线表示在某一时刻发生。

div.style: color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
div.span: action that takes place once, never or several times

div.style: color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
div.span: actions that happen one after another

div.style: color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
div.span: ◕ 周期行为 (Period of time)，进行式（Progressive）为跨线的行为表示。

div.style: color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
div.span: action that started before a certain moment and lasts beyond that moment

div.style: color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
div.span: actions taking place at the same time

div.style: color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
div.span: ◉ 行为效果 (Result)，完成式为时刻线之前发生的行为、事件。

div.style: color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
div.span: action taking place before a certain moment in time

div.style: color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
div.span: ● 持续行为 (Course / Duration)，完成进行式为时刻线之前发生的行为、事件。

div.style: color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
div.span: action taking place before a certain moment in time

div.style: color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
div.span: puts emphasis on the course or duration of the action

div.style: color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre; background-color: rgb(0, 43, 54); line-height: 18px;

font.face: Fira Code, Consolas, Courier New, monospace
font.span: 比如“我会吉他但是现在没有玩吉他”对应“一般现在”和“一般进行”表示，I play guitar, but I am not playing now.

div.style: background-color: rgb(0, 43, 54); line-height: 18px;

font.face: Fira Code, Consolas, Courier New, monospace

color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
div.span: 时态的基本结构：时间状态通过 `
div.font: ` 体现。现在时就是 do 或 does

font.face: Fira Code, Consolas, Courier New, monospace

span.font:
形式，将来时就变成 will 动词，过去时就变成 did 或 had。过去将来时就变成 could/would。行为状态上，
一般行为谓语就使用 do 或者 is 这样的 `

`，
进行中行为就变成 ~ing 形式的 `
`，完成进行也是进行态（完成+进行），have/has/had been。

div.style: color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
div.span: 过去时体现在实义动词的过去分词（一般是动词加 ed 后缀），或者助动词的过去分词上体现（had）。进行

div.style: color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
div.span: 式结构中，因为需要使用实义动词的现在分词（ing 后缀）形式来表达“进行中”，所以过去时这一语法特征

span.style: color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;

div.span: 只能通过引入辅助动词的过去式来体现。

font.face: Fira Code, Consolas, Courier New, monospace
Fira Code, Consolas, Courier New, monospace

span.font:
Simple Past ：我吃过饭了（腊肉炒芥菜的味道真好）。
Simple Present ：我吃米饭（陈述事实，但是我现在没吃）。
Simple Future ：我要吃饭啦（又到干饭时间）。
Past Progressive ：我刚才吃饭了（所以没听到你的电话）。
Present Progressive ：我在吃饭呢（别打扰我干饭）。
Future Progressive ：下午 1 点时我会吃着饭（这是计划）。
Past Perfect ：我刚才吃过饭的（肚子应该饿了）。
Present Perfect ：我刚吃过饭（你不会又想约我吃饭吧）。
Future Perfect ：我将要在 1 点吃饭（你不要等我了）。
Past Perfect Progressive ：我刚才在吃饭了（一直吃着没饱）。
Present Perfect Progressive ：我在吃饭（并且还没吃饱）。
Future Perfect Progressive ：下午 1 点我肯定吃着饭呢（没时间干别的）。

div.style: color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
div.span: 过去将来时（The Past Future Tense）使用上相对较少，并且概念上很古怪，更像是英语使用者总结出来的。

div.style: color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
div.span: Past Future 时态表示从过去时间看将来可能会发生的动作或者状态。主要在于“可能”，好比我上周说周末会

div.style: color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
div.span: 去打球，对于上周这个时间来说，周末打球是将来发生的事情，但是对于现在来说是已经过去的时间。为了区别这

div.style: color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
div.span: 种“过去将来”的过去时间与 Past 时态所指的过去，引入了过去将来时态，使用 would、should、could

div.style: color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
div.span: 助动词与时态中的 be、have 动词结构组合。

div.style: color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
div.span: + 动词原形，“过去时”由前面的助动词体现，“一般式”由动词原型体现；

div.style: color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
div.span: 等瞬间动词的过去进行时来表示过去将来时；

div.style: color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
div.span: to do 用于表示根据计划，安排定于某事做某事；

div.style: color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
div.span: 算上过去将来时，时态组合共有 16 种，但是最常用的是 Simple Present 和 Present Perfect Progressive，

div.style: color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
div.span: 它们分别用于表示当前的阶段的状态、习惯、客观，后者表示从过去到现在持续的动作、所起的作用效果或者

div.style: color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
div.span: 最近发生的事件。此外，还有几种较常用的时态：

div.style: color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
div.span: Simple Past 表示过去发生的事，或者过去经常或反复发生的动作。

div.style: color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
div.span: Simple Future 表示将来要发生的动作、或存在的状态，将来经常或反复发生的动作。

div.style: color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
div.span: Present Progressive 表示说话时正在发生的动作，因为使用动词现在分词，常被称为 ing 式。

div.style: color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
div.span: Present Perfect 表示过去发生或已经完成的动作对现在造成的影响或结果。

div.style: color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
div.span: Past Progressive 表示过去进行中的动作，这个时间由上下文给出或者使用时间状语。

div.style: color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
div.span: Past Perfect 表示过去的时间之前发生或完成了的动作，动作发生的时间是“过去的过去”。

div.style: color: rgb(131, 148, 150); font-family: "Fira Code", Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
